_header: Here I will you wise make
_description: Astrological prognostications for travelling — sixteen couplets

BLSl636.First Lines:
Here I will you wyse makewhen ye will a Iurney
                    take…

Mooney,  Linne R. 
             “Practical Didactic Works in Middle English.” 
         Diss. Toronto, 1981: 224-6.
